name: Ball Roller (Allergen Studios)
description:
Physics based, top-down ball rolling game.

  • Roll and bounce around 20 levels, avoiding lasers and spinning walls!
    • Do it as fast as possible and unlock doors with keys to get your way to the finish line!
  • Use stars to remove specific lasers!
  • Use your mouse and click on the board to make the ball roll over there!
    • WITH PHYSICS!
  • For all ages and family and friends!
  • MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT AND MORE LEVELS COMING SOON! (MAYBE)
